message.content:
1. The study was investigating the effects of a flexibility training program.
2. The flexibility training program was specific and standardized.
3. The duration of the flexibility training program was 8 weeks.
4. The study focused on the range of spinal motion.
5. The subjects of the study were elderly women.

messages.content:
Statement: The purpose of this study was to investigate the effects of an 8-week specific and standardized flexibility training program on the range of spinal motion in elderly women.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
